column5: Well this is my first report on here so I wanted it to be a good one.  I will make this short cause I can make a report long....  Went out onto the Big Rideau for lakers and caught 2 of them....One was about 2lbs...    and the other was this guy...      32" x 18" @ 13lbs....That almost doubles my old PB of 7lbs.  So a great morning for sure.

I just found out that I have been added to Team #9 in the tourney and this fish will probably not qualify as I did not have the logo etc in the pics    Sorry guys I will have the proper items next time.

WTG Peter     Congrats on your PB  She's a real beauty.... Must of giving you a great fight? Looks like she swallowed the hook from all that blood coming out of the gills.  Again Great job and thanks for sharing! Leechman
Actually Leechman...When we got him to the net the hook fell out
Beauty trout, congrats and keep the reports coming.
I call this a lucky scoop   Great job for the net man  Again Peter.... Great job Leechman
Nice report and pics!!!  Congrats on the PB!  Did you catch him on a french fry dipped in ketchup?... because that's what it looks like he's been eating... or is that... I feel wooozy
Beauty laker!  Don't see too many of them that size around here!
Wow, what a fish. Congrats! I have yet to catch a laker.

Nice fish Almonte Fisher I'll be up there for a full week starting Sunday..  Here is a nice one from last year...I hope for more like that this year....3-10 lbs is average...but occasionally a biggie comes up.
